data.eml:eml: Two new records of the Family Celaenopsidae (Acari: Mesostigmata) from China, with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xu, Yun, Li, Xiang, Zhang, Fei-Ping (2019): Two new records of the Family Celaenopsidae (Acari: Mesostigmata) from China, with description of a new species. Zootaxa 4604 (2): 326-334, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4604.2.5
